The spider spy, totally out of options completes the last of its
programming. With a burst of RF energy it sends out a burst of radio
communication, and then a cecophony of sound and color it errupts as
the lasers from the Predator reach it. It disappears in a small burst
of fire and flame. 

While it is not highly explosive, it is enough to destroy the cables it
is hiding in . . . covering the area inside the venting shafts with a
black sooty mess!

(OOC: The beast is dead!)

Preston
